trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SIULMET_000_001<tab>My apologies, traveler. It seems my courier has been waylaid, and I have nothing to offer you until she arrives.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>You must progress further through the Shadowbringers main scenario in order to access this vendor's wares.

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SIULMET_001_001<tab>Welcome, traveler. I am an authorized trader representing the Crystalline Mean in the acquisition of bicolor gemstones. If you find yourself in possession of any such gems, I can offer you a number of items provided by the facets in exchange.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SYSTEM_999_001<tab>You may now trade with Siulmet!
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SYSTEM_001_002<tab>You now have access to this region's gemstone exchange, through which bicolor gemstones can be traded for a variety of rare and exclusive items.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SYSTEM_001_003<tab>Successfully completing local FATEs will allow for the delivery of more valuable goods, increasing the number of items available for trade.

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SIULMET_002_001<tab>This is everything I have available at the moment. It is unfortunately too dangerous to transport more valuable items across Lakeland, what with Nightshade harrying everyone from merchants to the Crystarium guard.

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SIULMET_002_002<tab>Lakeland has seen more days without incident of late─enough for my couriers to risk delivery of a few more valuable items. Perhaps you will find something to your liking.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SIULMET_002_003<tab>I can scarce believe how safe the roads in Lakeland have become. At last, I can stock the best the facets have to offer!
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_ZUMUTT_000_001<tab>Lali-ho! I'd love to offer you some fine dwarven crafts, but I ain't set up just yet. Come back and see me later, you hear?
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_ZUMUTT_001_001<tab>Lali-ho! Can I interest you in some dwarven crafts? Other Kholusian fineries? It'll only cost you a few bicolor gemstones!
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SYSTEM_999_002<tab>You may now trade with Zumutt!

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_ZUMUTT_002_001<tab>Take a look and see if there's anything you like! Might be able to trade for some more goods to offer you if things got a bit less...murderous outside of the village, but for now this is what I have.

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_ZUMUTT_002_002<tab>Dwaaarven crafts! Fine dwarven craft─oh, pleasure to see you! You'll notice I have a decent selection of wares available. It's been a bit easier to trade for materials and the like of late.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_ZUMUTT_002_003<tab>Dwaaarven crafts! And by that I mean trade has really picked up 'round here, on account of the safer roads and all. Have a look!

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_HALDEN_000_001<tab>“You'll be the face of the business, Halden,” he says! What business? He hasn't even brought me the invento─oh, sorry. Didn't see you there. I would ask if I can help you, but I probably...can't?

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_HALDEN_001_001<tab>Very well. You can do this, Halden... Ahem! Give me your bicolor gemstones! Oh, that's not what I meant. I meant...I have stuff. Things. That I could trade you. Does that sound...good?
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SYSTEM_999_003<tab>You may now trade with Halden!

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_HALDEN_002_001<tab>Right. The things. The issue is, I don't have too much right now, it being so dangerous to keep valuables in stock out here... You can see what I <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> have, though!
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_HALDEN_002_002<tab>Oh, are you here for the things? I mean...the wares. The wares, yes. I've actually begun taking deliveries of a few more sorts, if you're interested!

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_HALDEN_002_003<tab>You've noticed that the trade routes have been much safer of late? Well, it's allowed me to procure some truly excellent wares. I'm sure that you'll find them to your liking! And...thank you for your patience.

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SULLAD_000_001<tab>This is dull! Dull, dull, dull! How <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> you mortals tolerate this “setting up shop” business? I've been waiting for my goods to arrive for <var 1A 02 /var>ages<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SULLAD_001_001<tab>Oh, mortal! Purchase something from my shop! Spend your... Hm, what <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> you mortals trade at these shops of yours, anyhow? Shiny rocks or something, I expect? Very well! Spend your shiny rocks here!
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SYSTEM_999_004<tab>You may now trade with Sul Lad!

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SULLAD_002_001<tab>I only have a few items that your lot would want at the moment─my couriers keep getting turned into hedges. It's hilarious, of course, but I'm not sure I'll ever have a proper shop at this rate. You'll peruse what I have, though. Or else.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SULLAD_002_002<tab>Now, mortal! Peruse my wares! I have new things─I have an <var 1A 02 /var>inventory<var 1A 01 /var>. Isn't that exciting?

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SULLAD_002_003<tab>Ahem! Welcome, mortal, welcome! I've taken deliveries. I have inventory─I have stock! Hee hee! Yes, I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> rather pleased with myself, why do you ask?
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_NACILLE_000_001<tab>Welcome, traveler. It is my intention to establish a small trading post here. I hope that you will return once I have everything in order.

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_NACILLE_001_001<tab>The time has come for the Viis to share more of our culture with the outside world, small as it has become. As my contribution to these efforts, I am happy to offer a variety of goods from the forest in exchange for any bicolor gemstones you might happen upon.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SYSTEM_999_005<tab>You may now trade with Nacille!

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_NACILLE_002_001<tab>I have only a small stock of wares, but you are welcome to them. If our hunters were able roam further from Fanow, I might be able to offer more, but as it stands we must prioritize their safety.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_NACILLE_002_002<tab>Please do have a look at what I am offering for trade. Much of it you will not find outside of the Greatwood.

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_NACILLE_002_003<tab>You might notice that I now have a rather impressive selection─our hunters have been able to supply me with rare finds from throughout the wood. They speak to the richness of Viis culture, and I think you will find much here to your liking.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_GOUSHSOOAN_000_001<tab>If you came to trade, finless one, I'm afraid you are destined for disappointment. My goods have not yet arrived.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_GOUSHSOOAN_001_001<tab>Trade my goods for your bicolor gemstones? I sssuppose I could─or rather, should. That's what I'm here for.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_SYSTEM_999_006<tab>You may now trade with Goushs Ooan!

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_GOUSHSOOAN_002_001<tab>You'll doubtless be disappointed by the paltry selection I have to offer at the moment. But I'm ssstuck here whether or not either of us like it, so you may as well have a look.

TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_GOUSHSOOAN_002_002<tab>Very well, peruse my goods. Honestly, I wouldn't recommend them. Though I sssuppose I wouldn't recommend <var 1A 02 /var>against<var 1A 01 /var> them, either.
TEXT_CMNFATSHOP1N4FIELD_00583_GOUSHSOOAN_002_003<tab>Here for my wares, finless one? I actually have a rather fine ssselection now, and trade is flourishing. It...will take some getting used to.
